name: Gravity Weighted Blanket
description: Weighted blankets are therapeutic blankets that typically weigh between 5 and 30 pounds. They can help to relieve pain, lessen anxiety, and improve mood.

description: Aromatherapy may help with relaxation, sleep, and mood. It may even reduce blood pressure and heart rate, all of which can reduce anxiety.

description: The Shakti Acupressure Mat simulates acupuncture benefits by stimulating pressure points and creating a deep relaxation state. Made with organic cotton and natural dyes, it's a great sustainable choice

name: Herbal tea
description: Herbal teas are made from tisanes, which are blends or infusions of dried fruits, flowers, spices or herbs in water. Tisanes have been shown to offer medicinal effects.

name: Erligpowht Light Therapy Lamp
description: Light therapy lamps are bright lamps commonly used to treat seasonal affective disorder (SAD), depression, and sleep disorders. The lamps are widely available, and you can use them at home.
